trans-unit.target: TEXT_STMBDZ903_02859_SEQ_00<tab>Rawkin is in need of an adventurer with a strong pair of legs.
TEXT_STMBDZ903_02859_TODO_00<tab>Pick up the earthenware vase.
TEXT_STMBDZ903_02859_TODO_01<tab>Deliver the earthenware vase to the Midlander merchant.
TEXT_STMBDZ903_02859_TODO_02<tab>Report to Rawkin.

TEXT_STMBDZ903_02859_RAWKIN_000_000<tab>You've the look of a <var 08 E905 ((woman)) ((man)) /var> who travels. Aye, a <var 08 E905 ((woman)) ((man)) /var> not afraid to do a bit of walking. Might be you could help me with something.

TEXT_STMBDZ903_02859_RAWKIN_000_001<tab>I was to make a delivery of provisions to Ala Ghiri, but it's taken me so long to get everything ready, I'm afraid I'll never get there by the agreed-upon time.
TEXT_STMBDZ903_02859_RAWKIN_000_002<tab>The only way I'd even have a chance at this point is to pass through the Scabbard.
TEXT_STMBDZ903_02859_RAWKIN_000_003<tab>That's assuming, of course, I don't break my legs climbing down the cliffside. By the look of you, I'm betting you could do it without breaking a sweat.
TEXT_STMBDZ903_02859_RAWKIN_000_004<tab>If you'd be willing to help, pick up that vase there and carry it down to Ala Ghiri.
TEXT_STMBDZ903_02859_RAWKIN_000_005<tab>The fastest way to Ala Ghiri is through the Scabbard. Mind your step climbing down the cliff.
TEXT_STMBDZ903_02859_SYSTEM_100_005<tab>Transport the earthenware vase to the specified location at Ala Ghiri before the Midlander merchant grows impatient and calls off the arrangement.
TEXT_STMBDZ903_02859_SYSTEM_101_005<tab>You will have two minutes to complete the task. Should you fail, return to the starting location and begin anew.
TEXT_STMBDZ903_02859_SYSTEM_102_005<tab>Be wary of attacks from enemies, which will sap your strength.
TEXT_STMBDZ903_02859_MERCHANT02859_000_006<tab>What in the hells is taking him so long? I haven't all day.
TEXT_STMBDZ903_02859_MERCHANT02859_000_010<tab>deleted
TEXT_STMBDZ903_02859_MERCHANT02859_000_011<tab>Rawkin's supplies! Thank you, <var 08 E905 ((miss)) ((sir)) /var>, for coming all this way.
TEXT_STMBDZ903_02859_MERCHANT02859_000_012<tab>Tell him he can expect payment to be delivered in the next few days as promised.
TEXT_STMBDZ903_02859_MERCHANT02859_000_013<tab>I'm a man of my word. As soon as this shipment reaches its final destination, his payment will be sent at once.
TEXT_STMBDZ903_02859_RAWKIN_000_020<tab>You made it? Thank the gods.

TEXT_STMBDZ903_02859_RAWKIN_000_021<tab>Back in the day, I could've climbed up and down that mountain on one leg if I wanted. I was a soldier, you see, so I had to stay in top physical condition. But war can be cruel. After a few nasty injuries, it was a wonder I made it back here at all.
TEXT_STMBDZ903_02859_RAWKIN_000_022<tab>It was thinking about my time in service, though, that reminded me that soldiers now will be needing any medicine they can get their hands on.
TEXT_STMBDZ903_02859_RAWKIN_000_023<tab>We don't have much, but with everyone pitching in, we can usually sell enough to get by.
TEXT_STMBDZ903_02859_RAWKIN_000_024<tab>Just enough for warm clothes and food to fill our bellies. It's a simple life, but I wouldn't trade it for anything.
